entries.journal_entry_description: Iluna has suggested you look for Brody Johnson at the Arcona compound in northeast Etyyy.
entries.journal_entry_title: Brody Johnson and the Arcona Compound
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Iluna suggests you go to the Arcona compound and ask there for any information about Brody Johnson.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Ask around for any information about Brody Johnson at the Arcona compound.
